validUser.expectedMessage: Thank you for registering with Main Website Store.
validUser.comment: Should log in with valid credentials

validFirstLastName.expected: Minimum length of this field must be equal or greater than 8 symbols. Leading and trailing spaces will be ignored
validFirstLastName.comment: Should not register with a password less than 8 characters

sevenCharacters.expected: Minimum of different classes of characters in the password is 3. Classes of characters: Lower Case, Upper Case, Digits, Special Characters.
sevenCharacters.comment: Have less then 8 characters and all  in the password field

lessThenMinOnlyNumbers.expected: Minimum of different classes of characters in the password is 3. Classes of characters: Lower Case, Upper Case, Digits, Special Characters.
lessThenMinOnlyNumbers.comment: Have less then 8 characters and all characters are numbers in the password field

strongPassword.expected: Please enter the same value again.
strongPassword.comment: Should log in with valid credentials

existingEmail.expectedMessage: There is already an account with this email address. If you are sure that it is your email address, click here to get your password and access your account.
existingEmail.comment: Should log in with valid credentials

emailAndPasswordNotTheSame.expected: The password can't be the same as the email address. Create a new password and try again.
emailAndPasswordNotTheSame.comment: Should log in with valid credentials
